title: A Very Pretty Mess: EJ/Tom, RHOA Recap, RHOC Check In + RHOP Reunion Part 2
itunes:title: A Very Pretty Mess: EJ/Tom, RHOA Recap, RHOC Check In + RHOP Reunion Part 2
itunes:subtitle: It's the last Bravo recap for Everything Iconic in 2020, so we're covering a lot of ground. First up, The Pretty Mess/T*m Instagram debacle. Then Danny dives in to this week's Real Housewives of Atlanta, Real Housewives of Orange County,...
description:
It's the last Bravo recap for Everything Iconic in 2020, so we're covering a lot of ground. First up, The Pretty Mess/T*m Instagram debacle. Then Danny dives in to this week's Real Housewives of Atlanta, Real Housewives of Orange County, and finally the second part of the Potomac reunion.


*PLEASE NOTE THAT EVERYTHING MENTIONED ON THIS PODCAST IS ALLEGED and not based on fact, simply comedic reporting of an instagram post.


RHOA: 13:10ish

RHOC: 22:15ish

RHOP: 25:45ish


Buy Everything Iconic merch at EverythingIconic.store


PS Subscribe to Danny's holiday podcast, A Very Merry Iconic Podcast, wherever you get your pods!


*To support this pod & access bonus episodes, visit Patreon.com/EverythingIconic
